alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 1:30AM EDT until July 29 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early this morning to 22.4 feet this morning. It will then fall this afternoon. It will rise to 21.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.4 feet on 12/04/1991. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM Thursday.
